summary: Norway, WWII: A group of British and German soldiers find themselves stranded in the wilderness after an aircraft battle. Finding shelter in the same cabin, they realize the only way to survive the winter is to place the rules of war aside.
cast: Florian Lukas|David Kross|Stig Henrik Hoff|Lachlan Nieboer|Rupert Grint|Kim Haugen|Knut Joner|Morten Faldaas|Sondre Krogtoft Larsen
title: Perdidos en la nieve
